summary: Replace the werewolf transformation into an Alien Queen transformation.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]ALIEN QUEEN 1.0
[/size]
[youtube]F-5rbTh7VZw[/youtube]

[size=5]Changes:[/size]

[u]Optik:[/u]

Replaces all werewolf modells into alien queen accept aela

[u]Sound:[/u]
-replaces the werewolf sounds with alien/queen sounds
breathing sound
pain sound 
footsteps (giant steps)

[u]attack data:[/u]
alien queen power attack like an giant
queen can call her brute 
(2 alien drones)

[size=5][u]

Recommended Mod:[/u][/size]
to Change the size 
Note when you choose the biggest one. you cant move in a dungeon.
but better for alien immersion

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32414/?

[b][size=6]//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
[/size][/b][b][size=6]i have not made the alien queen model.
i just replace the werewolf model  in a folder with it.
it's not ripped from another game
it's been ripped straight from another mod in the steam workshop
bsa and esp are identical in size and name

Thx Dogtown1 a lot for your great work.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=176344457[/size][/b]
[size=6]\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\[/size]
